snippet: Major League Baseball said plans to increase video reviews to include trapped balls, fair-or-foul calls down the lines and fan interference all around the ballpark had been shelved for the year.
abstract: Major League Baseball shelves plans to increase video reviews to include trapped balls, fair-or-foul calls down the lines and fan interference; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball said plans to increase video reviews to include trapped balls, fair-or-foul calls down the lines and fan interference all around the ballpark had been shelved for the year.

headline.print_headline: Added Video Review Is Put Aside for the Year
